title: Authors and Citation
text: Ali Y, Snyder K (2023). toxSummary: Visualize Summarize Nonclinical Study Results. R package version 0.0.0.9000.
code: @Manual{,   title = {toxSummary: Visualize and Summarize Nonclinical Study Results},   author = {Yousuf Ali and Kevin Snyder},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

title: Visualize and Summarize Nonclinical Study Results
Visualize and Summarize Nonclinical Study Results
text: Clone repo set repo working directory. Open app.R file (copy code given ) run code. open toxSummary app. default/example database (“test_data/test_db.db” directory) contain studies. connect database pkgload::load_all(".")  toxSummary::toxSummary_app(     database_path = "path///database.db",     studyid_file = "path//IND_studyid_mapping.csv",     save_file_path = NULL )
code: pkgload::load_all(".")  db_path <- "test_data/test_db.db" study_list_path <- "test_data/IND_with_studies_2.csv"  toxSummary::toxSummary_app(     database_path = db_path,     studyid_file = study_list_path,     save_file_path = NULL )

title: Visualize and Summarize Nonclinical Study Results
text: can install like R package run database_path = "path///database.db"studyid_file = "path//IND_studyid_mapping.csv" argument mandatory running function package. Package contain database. Database big package.
code: # install devtools if already not installed  install.packages("devtools") #install toxSummary package devtools::install_github('phuse-org/toxSummary') toxSummary::toxSummary_app(     database_path = "path/of/your/database.db",     studyid_file = "path/for/IND_studyid_mapping.csv",     save_file_path = NULL )

title: Visualize and Summarize Nonclinical Study Results

title: run toxSummary app — toxSummary_app
code: toxSummary_app(   database_path,   studyid_file,   save_file_path = NULL,   where_to_run = "local" )

title: run toxSummary app — toxSummary_app
text: database_path Mandatory/cr file path database studyid_file Mandatory/cr file path studyid save_file_path optional path created application file saved. NULL, file saved  working directory where_to_run Mandatory/cr run running. Default local
